body:
@aselle 
Thx for your guide, the memory usage do increases. The log in my MBP with CPU-version tensorflow is as below

```
step: 323
read image cost: 40s
step cost: 65s
Memory usage: 5172464
step: 324
read image cost: 40s
step cost: 67s
Memory usage: 5190316
step: 325
read image cost: 40s
step cost: 65s
Memory usage: 5224076
step: 326
read image cost: 42s
step cost: 67s
Memory usage: 5243708
step: 327
read image cost: 47s
step cost: 76s
Memory usage: 5285364
```

After several steps (from check point) the memory usage start increases, I don't know why, you can see my [code](https://github.com/ruiann/SRGAN/blob/master/SRGAN/train.py)
